title: Vegetable Cannelloni
ingredients: ['70g chopped mushrooms', '1 onion, chopped', '120g sliced carrots', '150g peas', '90g chopped broccoli', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '4 tablespoons dry red wine', '225g grated mozzarella cheese', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '450g lasagne sheets', '750g tomato based pasta sauce']
